'''Berek''' was a [[horse]] from [[Armenelos]] in [[Númenor]] that [[Isildur]] personally rode. Berek was invented by [[Amazon Studios]] for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]''.

==History==
Berek was Isildur's horse and was ridden by him during the [[Udûn (episode)|Battle]] of [[Tirharad]].

After the disappearance of Isildur after the eruption of [[Mount Doom|Orodruin]], Berek refused to allow [[Elendil]] to handle him and was let loose, dashing off across the fields in search of Isildur.

==Etymology==
The name ''Berek'' contains the [[Sindarin]] root ''[[BERÉK]]''.
